医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
疑似肺炎患者抗生素使用及临床因素的前瞻性研究本研究探讨了法国全科医生在治疗疑似肺炎患者时，胸部 X 光检查结果如何影响抗生素的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/A-prospective-study-of-antibiotic-use-and-clinical-factors-in-病人-with-suspected-pneumonia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/A-prospective-study-of-antibiotic-use-and-clinical-factors-in-病人-with-suspected-pneumonia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b308a30d-d919-4f78-9fd2-ce6f27e7c5be Tue, 26 Nov 2024 01:21:04 -0500 A prospective study of antibiotic use and clinical factors in patients with suspected pneumonia
揭开细菌 DNA 超螺旋的秘密来自杜伦大学、雅盖隆大学（波兰）和约翰·英尼斯中心的研究人员在理解 DNA 旋转酶（一种重要的细菌酶和关键抗生素靶标）方面取得了突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Unmasking-the-secrets-of-bacterial-DNA-supercoiling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Unmasking-the-secrets-of-bacterial-DNA-supercoiling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf171074-66c3-4723-8a00-7312f58054cd Tue, 26 Nov 2024 01:13:56 -0500 Unmasking the secrets of bacterial DNA supercoiling
更年期早期的激素疗法被证明是安全的，但缺乏认知益处早期绝经期激素治疗既不会有益也不会损害长期认知，可以让健康女性放心，但无法防止认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Hormone-therapy-in-early-menopause-proves-safe-but-lacks-cognitive-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241126/Hormone-therapy-in-early-menopause-proves-safe-but-lacks-cognitive-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=021f5975-00de-48ef-acc3-b1bbedf0457a Tue, 26 Nov 2024 00:16:00 -0500 Hormone therapy in early menopause proves safe but lacks cognitive benefits
咖啡重塑巴西饮食：糖分上升，牛奶下降，健康风险凸显巴西的咖啡消费影响饮食选择，增加糖和甜味剂的摄入量，同时减少牛奶和含糖饮料的消费，具有显着的性别差异和公共健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Coffee-reshapes-Brazilian-diets-sugar-up-milk-down-and-health-risks-highlighted.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Coffee-reshapes-Brazilian-diets-sugar-up-milk-down-and-health-risks-highlighted.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=124c7c61-afb0-4356-891c-00c4be55c9ef Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:49:00 -0500 Coffee reshapes Brazilian diets: sugar up, milk down, and health risks highlighted
IHME 研究揭示全球抗击艾滋病毒/艾滋病的重大进展和差距健康指标与评估研究所 (IHME) 在《柳叶刀》艾滋病毒杂志上发表了一项新研究，揭示了全球抗击艾滋病毒/艾滋病方面取得的重大进展，同时发出严厉警告，当前趋势表明世界尚未走上实现艾滋病毒/艾滋病目标的正轨。雄心勃勃的联合国艾滋病规划署 2030 年目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/IHME-study-reveals-significant-progress-and-gaps-in-the-global-fight-against-HIVAIDS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/IHME-study-reveals-significant-progress-and-gaps-in-the-global-fight-against-HIVAIDS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5c92eb2-f4cf-4a49-bf8a-0f28ac215bb2 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:24:25 -0500 IHME study reveals significant progress and gaps in the global fight against HIV/AIDS
使用适应的名义组技术来塑造老年人的护理轨迹参与性研究方法是家庭医学和初级卫生保健研究的重要工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Using-adapted-nominal-group-technique-to-shape-care-trajectories-for-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Using-adapted-nominal-group-technique-to-shape-care-trajectories-for-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e7c8882-282b-4269-a298-377187b16ae5 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:10:41 -0500 Using adapted nominal group technique to shape care trajectories for older adults
为家庭医生在战时护理中发挥更大的作用做好准备在战争和冲突中，家庭医生经常被要求发挥更大的作用，并目睹个人、家庭、社区和民众遭受的巨大精神和身体痛苦。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Preparing-family-phycians-for-expanded-roles-in-wartime-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Preparing-family-phycians-for-expanded-roles-in-wartime-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53c79416-43c4-4823-88f1-a79aa358b524 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:06:53 -0500 Preparing family physicians for expanded roles in wartime care
大流行期间医疗保险和医疗补助受益人与健康相关的社会需求增加在 COVID-19 大流行期间，为满足 Medicare 和 Medicaid 受益人的健康相关社会需求 (HRSN)（例如住房和食物）所做的努力还不够。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Health-lated-social-needs-increased-for-Medicare-and-Medicaid-beneficiaries-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Health-lated-social-needs-increased-for-Medicare-and-Medicaid-beneficiaries-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e28a8eb-5e4e-46e8-b97d-0fcd71a767d7 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 23:04:47 -0500 Health-related social needs increased for Medicare and Medicaid beneficiaries during the pandemic
Atlas 绘制血浆蛋白图谱以改变疾病诊断和治疗研究人员开发了最全面的图谱，将血浆蛋白与超过 53,000 名个体的疾病和特征联系起来，为精准医疗提供了突破性的见解。该资源揭示了 168,100 个蛋白质与疾病的关联，并确定了新的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Atlas-maps-plasma- Proteins-to-transform-disease-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Atlas-maps-plasma- Proteins-to-transform-disease-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dad7b394-b06d-4152-a779-f519c8c81b0d Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Atlas maps plasma proteins to transform disease diagnosis and treatment
蛋白质凝胶为个人护肤品提供可持续解决方案如果您有细致的护肤习惯，您就会知道个人护肤品 (PSCP) 是一门大生意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Protein-based-gel-offers-sustainable-solution-for-personal-skincare-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Protein-based-gel-offers-sustainable-solution-for-personal-skincare-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20bbcc5c-4fee-4c76-9967-aeb05d800281 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 22:57:44 -0500 Protein-based gel offers sustainable solution for personal skincare products
